amendment.description: To provide the use of the deficit-neutral reserve fund for tax relief for reauthorizing the new markets tax credit for an additional 5 years.

vote.text: Amendment SA 629 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 629 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Snowe. (consideration: CR S3698-3702; text as modified: CR S3700) To provide the use of the deficit-neutral reserve fund for tax relief for reauthorizing the new markets tax credit for an additional 5 years.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 629 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 629 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Snowe.
